      • getStatusIcon

        public java.lang.String getStatusIcon()
        Get the completion status as an icon. If the task is done, it will be marked as [✓]. If the task is still pending, it will be marked as [✘].
        Returns:
        the status icon

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()

        Mark a task as done, change the completion status icon

        Parameters:

      • updateTaskCount

        public static int updateTaskCount()
        Update the task count when the list of tasks is modified.
        Returns:
        new task count after modification
